Dio, a Definitive AI Sculpture in Neural Magazine "But Snell goes a step further: once the sculpture is conceived and formalised, he grinds the computer to dust and builds the sculpture out if it. He freezes the computational clock in its most daring form, which will never be recalculated by the same machine again, but fully amalgamated in its own materiality...."
